title: There Is a Mouse in the House
subtle: Humorous (fiction), 56 words, Level C (Grade K), Lexile BR10L
description: There Is a Mouse in the House is a delightful story that students will love! Detailed illustrations, clever rhymes, and a predictable text structure will support early emergent readers. Students will also have the opportunity to make, revise, and confirm predictions as well as to identify characters and setting in order to better understand the story.
reviewWords: air, boat, cup, fox, house, tea
comprehension: Identify Characters and Setting                : Identify characters and setting in a story
phonics: Word Families : Identify word families -ug and -ut
wordWork: High-Frequency Words : Identify and use high-frequency words in, is, there
